name: Telegram Files Store Bot
description: A Telegram Files Store Bot in Pyrogram by @AnnihilusOP

API_ID.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

API_HASH.description: Get this value from my.telegram.org or @TeleORG_Bot

BOT_USERNAME.description: Your Bot Username which you sent to @BotFather (Without [@])

DB_CHANNEL.description: The Channel ID which will be used as Database. Example: -100 And ID

DATABASE_URL.description: MongoDB Database URI for Saving UserID for Broadcast.

BROADCAST_AS_COPY.description: Broadcast with Forward Tag or as Copy(Without Forward Tag). Value should be True/False !!

FORWARD_AS_COPY.description: If True all messages will be forwarder As Copy. If False all messages will be forwarder with Forward Tag. Value should be True/False !!
